=== Creates a point geometry as map

[source,cypher]
----
WITH point({latitude: 5.0, longitude: 4.0}) as geom RETURN spatial.asMap(geom) AS geometry
----

.Result

[opts="header",cols="1"]
|===
|geometry
a|
[source]
----
{
  "coordinate" : [ 4.0, 5.0 ],
  "type" : "Point"
}
----

|===
